gate.jape

Class Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.jape.Transducer
      • gate.jape.Rule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JapeConstants, Benchmarkable, Serializable

    public class Rule
extends Transducer
implements JapeConstants, Serializable
    A CPSL rule. Has an LHS, RHS and a name, and a priority.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
